page.title: 11INLAND WATER
page.content: {STREAMS}The candover Stream runs through Northington, thence via the River Arle into the River Itchen. Water is taken from the river south of Winchester to supply Portsmouth. Estimates of Portsmouth's water needs by the end of the century required increased water flow particularly in dry summers. A scheme was devised and installed whereby water could be abstracted from underground reserves by boreholes to the south of Northington, piped down the valley underground, and discharged into the Candover Stream south of Northington in order to supplement river flow when required.
